doc:
Edgar Stehli https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edgar_Stehli 0 Edgar Stehli (July 12, 1884 – July 25, 1973) was an American actor. He appeared in the films Boomerang, Executive Suite, Drum Beat, The Cobweb, The Brothers Karamazov, No Name on the Bullet, 4D Man, Cash McCall, Atlantis, the Lost Continent, Parrish, Pocketful of Miracles, The Spiral Road, Twilight of Honor, Seconds, The Tiger Makes Out and Loving, among others. His television appearances include: Perry Mason Season 1, Episode 39 (1958) as Daniel Reed in, “The Case of the Rolling Bones”. He died on July 25, 1973, at his home in Upper Montclair, New Jersey at age 89. Edgar_Stehli ( July_12_,_1884 – July_25_,_1973 ) was an_American_actor . He appeared in the_films_Boomerang , Executive_Suite , Drum_Beat , The_Cobweb , The_Brothers_Karamazov , No Name on the_Bullet , 4D_Man , Cash_McCall , Atlantis , the_Lost_Continent , Parrish , Pocketful of Miracles , The_Spiral_Road , Twilight of Honor , Seconds , The_Tiger Makes Out_and_Loving , among others . His_television_appearances include : Perry_Mason_Season 1 , Episode_39 ( 1958_) as Daniel_Reed in , “ The_Case of the_Rolling_Bones_” . He died on July_25_,_1973 , at his_home in Upper_Montclair , New_Jersey at age_89 .
